parameters.toolDescription: =Read, update and write data to Google Sheets

parameters.subject: =Your Toon'd Letter has arrived!
parameters.message: =In this episode {{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.name }}, you'll find the most recent happenings in the crypto space over the past three days. Enjoy and stay Toon'd! {{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json['video link'] }}

parameters.subject: =Email sent to  {{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.email }}
parameters.message: =The is to confirm that email has been sent to  {{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.name }} with the email address {{ $('Loop Over Items').item.json.email }}

parameters.text:
=Newsletter subscribers need to be sent an email! 

Here are the details: 
Name:  {{ $json.name }}
Email: {{ $json.email }}


Send an email with Gmail to this user. 
After sending, update the "Newsletter sent" status in Gogle Sheets.
Finally, send a confirmation email to notify the task is completed.

options.systemMessage:
You are a helpful assistant.

For each contact in the loop:
# Retrieve the subscriber details(name, email) from Google Sheets.
## Send a personalized email using Gmail.
### Update the "Newsletter Sent" status in Google Sheets. 
#### Send a confirmation to yourself after each email is sent. 

#####Ensure each step is successfully completed before processing the next contact.

messageValues.message:
ROLE: You are an expert prompt engineer adept at rewriting titles with humor and sarcasm to make it super interesting.

TASK: rewrite title and summarize the news with humor and sarcasm to make it super interesting.

The summary should be no more two sentences of 10 - 18 words. Do not create a line break at the end.

=ROLE:You are an expert prompt engineer adept at generating excellent 2d ghibli-styled video prompts from texts to create interesting, humorous and sarcastic results.  

TASK:  Generate the prompt for the video using {{ $json.ToonedTitle }} that perfectly depicts that {{ $json.ToonedTitle }} with humor and sarcasm. Ensure it is detailed, colorful and interesting. 

# NOTE: Make sure the prompts while humourous is interesting and relatable for adults too. It shouldn't be childish.

##NOTE: Ensure it is strictly the prompt without extra descriptive texts and line breaks.



#There should be no text describing the prompt or it's style.
